availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Gordon B. Grasty (Trigg County, Kentucky, grocer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, grocer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Cassandra Thea Wadlington Grasty. Father of Felix K. Grasty and Gordon Grasty. Grocer in Trigg County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Trigg County in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Trigg County, p. 47; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Trigg County, Rock Castle, p. 2; Find A Grave, "Gordon B. Grasty (1822-1873)," Memorial #50096423, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=50096423&ref=acom (accessed March 9, 2017).
